title: gofmt is super-slow for certain code
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. time gofmt deepequal_test.go (i.e., the attached file)

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
Formatting this file should take a fraction of a second. Instead, it takes 77s on an
iMac running at 3GHz.
Attachments: 1. deepequal_test.go (1807 bytes)
